snippet: A new mansion in Hastings-on-Hudson would seem to be more at home in Westchester County’s highest-rent districts, or in affluent towns like Bedford and North Salem farther north.
abstract: Appraisal column; residents of Hastings-on-Hudson feel that mansion being built by David E Shaw and his wife Beth Kobliner would be more at home in Westchester County’s highest-rent districts; contemporary structure and accompanying pool house together measure more than 30,000 square feet and underground garage alone is larger than most Tudors and Colonials in the town.
lead_paragraph: A new mansion in Hastings-on-Hudson would seem to be more at home in Westchester County’s highest-rent districts, or in affluent towns like Bedford and North Salem farther north.

headline.main: Billionaire’s Sprawling Compound Challenges a Village’s Mellow Ethos
headline.print_headline: Billionaire’s Sprawling Compound Challenges a Village’s Mellow Ethos
